titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude from gross income amounts received for personal injuries or sickness resulting from service as a qualified public safety employee.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care
Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary: 4/30/2014--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income, for income tax purposes, amounts received as a pension, annuity, or similar allowance for personal injuries or sickness resulting from service as a qualified public safety employee (defined as a state or local employee who provides police protection, firefighting services, or emergency medical services).
